SELECT TS.id AS suggest_id , TS.trade_id , TS.trade_item_id , '' AS file_id , '' AS file_url , TS.gacha_id , TS.type , TS.status , TS.user_id , U.nickname AS user_nickname , TS.content , TS.created_at , TS.purchase_item_id , GI_P.name AS purchase_item_name , TS.purchase_original_price , TS.purchase_discount_yn , TS.purchase_discount_price , TS.exchange_seller_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_seller_item_name , TS.exchange_change_yn , TS.exchange_suggested_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_suggested_item_name , TS.exchange_original_item_id AS exchange_seller_want_item_id , GI_E3.name AS exchange_seller_want_item_name , CASE WHEN CH.canceled_user_id = #{userId} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS my_cancel_yn , CH.cancel_reason FROM TRADE_SUGGEST TS LEFT JOIN USER U ON U.id = TS.user_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_P ON GI_P.id = TS.purchase_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TS.exchange_seller_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TS.exchange_suggested_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E3 ON GI_E3.id = TS.exchange_original_item_id LEFT JOIN TRADE_CANCEL_HISTORY CH ON CH.trade_suggest_id = TS.id WHERE TS.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND TS.status != 'DELETED' ORDER BY TS.status = 'COMPLETED' DESC, TS.status = 'PENDING' DESC, TS.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT TS.id AS suggest_id , TS.trade_id , TS.trade_item_id , T.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = T.file_id ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1) AS file_url , TS.gacha_id , TS.type , TS.status , TS.user_id , U.nickname AS user_nickname , TS.content , TS.created_at , TS.purchase_item_id , GI_P.name AS purchase_item_name , TS.purchase_original_price , TS.purchase_discount_yn , TS.purchase_discount_price , TS.exchange_seller_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_seller_item_name , TS.exchange_change_yn , TS.exchange_suggested_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_suggested_item_name , TS.exchange_original_item_id AS exchange_seller_want_item_id , GI_E3.name AS exchange_seller_want_item_name , CASE WHEN CH.canceled_user_id = #{userId} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS my_cancel_yn , CH.cancel_reason FROM TRADE_SUGGEST TS LEFT JOIN USER U ON U.id = TS.user_id LEFT JOIN TRADE T ON T.id = TS.trade_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_P ON GI_P.id = TS.purchase_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TS.exchange_seller_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TS.exchange_suggested_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E3 ON GI_E3.id = TS.exchange_original_item_id LEFT JOIN TRADE_CANCEL_HISTORY CH ON CH.trade_suggest_id = TS.id WHERE TS.user_id = #{userId} AND TS.status != 'DELETED' ORDER BY TS.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
